about.project: Our project is a depository of sloths. View all existing stickers, download the necessary ones or chill a bit - why not? Feel a sloth!
about.team: We are a team of beginner frontend developers. We welcome you to our project, which we completed as part of the final task of the JS/FE2022Q1 Rolling Scopes School course!

sloths.title: About RS SLOTHS
sloths.descr: We have gathered all the sloths together for you! Now you just need to go to the catalog, select the necessary ones and download them. Any ideas, but no such sloth? Suggest! It can be a ready-made sloth, a sketch drawing or just a text description - and if the idea resonates with sloth fans, it will definitely come true!

interactives.title: Interactive
interactives.descr: We have tried to make sure that you can relax during your stay on our resource. Relax and play Memory Game, try to correctly guess all the sloths in the game of the same name, or create memes based on existing stickers: fun time, work hour! And since you've come here, don't forget to find out what kind of sloth you're today!

teammates.main: WOV WOV Team is a team of like-minded people who strive to create something new, interesting and beautiful. We're for a businesslike attitude to humor and a humorous attitude to business!
teammates.wiijoy: Designer, memolog and Vue.js promoter. Performed the initial setup, created a design layout and carried out work on the front-end part of the project.
teammates.ogimly: Queen of TypeScript, mistress of API requests and just a good person. Worked on the front-end part of the project, completed all the work on communicating the front-end component with its server part.
teammates.vanet: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. In short, team-lead. Gathered a team, solved all organizational questions (and just solved), developed the backend of the project.

sloth.title: What kind of sloth are you today

body.authorization: In order to access the RS Sloths, you need to login with your GitHub account
body.del-sloth: Do you really want to delete this wonderful sloth?
body.del-user: Do you really want to delete this wonderful user?

404.title: 404: Page Not Found
404.text:
Sloth made a bug or didn't make this page.
Please check the correctness of path again
